• Collection
  • Road Map
Moody Krows is a collection of 10,000 randomly generated Moody Krow NFTs on Immutable, a Layer 2 solution on the Ethereum blockchain. This means you can use your regular MetaMask wallet and ETH with NO GAS FEES. These 10,000 Moody Krows are an expressive collectible avatar made for our Krowmunity! Not only are our Moody Krows incredibly stylish, fun, and imaginative, but they are also for a good cause.

Collection

Road Map

  • 0%

    A pre-sale will take place with a reduced price of 0.025 ETH per NFT.

    Don’t miss this opportunity to be an early member of the Krowmunity at a reduced price! Join discord for more information.

  • 20%

    The Forest will now be OPEN. Welcome to your new happy place.

    The private discord channel will be available exclusively for Moody Krow owners.

  • 40%

    The Krowmunity wallet will be opened. Spread your wings!

    The Krowmunity wallet will be used for a variety of opportunities to advance our Krowmunity’s longevity: decided by YOU! Get extra rewards by joining and participating in our discord. (Big surprises coming soon)

  • 60%

    Our Krowards program will be open for all Moody Krow owners!

    All Moody Krow owners will now be able to engage in our rewards program that rewards participation and growth within our Discord server.

  • 80%

    Limited Moody Krow merch drop!!!

    Are you ready to dig your Klaws into the extraordinary designs we’ve come up with for our merchandise line. Lucky Moody Krow owners will be awarded a chance at free merchandise!

  • 100%

    NEW FREE NFTs FOR ALL MOODY KROWS!
